original_text: But they would not listen and were as stiff-necked as their ancestors, who did not trust in the Lord their God.
korean_text: 그들이 듣지 아니하고 그들의 목을 곧게 하기를 그들의 하나님 여호와를 믿지 아니하던 그들 조상들의 목 같이 하여

sentences.original_text: and were as stiff-necked as their ancestors
who did not trust in the Lord their God
